author: scottbw
msg: This is a partial fix for WOOKIE-64 that encloses scripts in CDATA sections during parsing, and which are then removed when the widget is saved. This gets rid of the problem of escaping of script content.

msg: optimize the thread local enqueue case.

author: genspring
msg: GERONIMO-4973 Classpath entrys in karaf-client.jar is ../system/ instead of ../repository/,  bundles might not be the best place to put karaf-client. But let's put it here for now.

msg: Adding the plumbing to get inputstreams for class files. These will be passed BCEL for annotation scanning.
